Chewbacca Wookiee Costume
Costume Wookiee Chewbacca
Chewbacca Wookiee-Kostüm
Costume Wookiee Chewbecca
Traje de wookiee Chewbacca
チューバッカ・ウーキーコスチューム
츄바카 우키 복장
Chewbacca Wookiee Costume
秋巴卡武技人的裝束
秋巴卡武技人的裝束
Chewbacca Wookiee Costume
kDesc

Become the mighty Chewbacca, one of the most celebrated Wookiees in the galaxy. You'll be extremely successful at just about everything you do when wearing this costume. Have you ever heard the phrase, "let the Wookiee win?"[#Legal]

Devenez le puissant Chewbacca, un des Wookiees les plus célèbres de la galaxie. Vous réussirez pratiquement tout ce que vous entreprendrez en portant ce costume. Vous avez déjà entendu la phrase "laisse le Wookiee gagner" ?[#Legal]

Mit dem Kostüm wird man zum mächtigen Chewbacca, dem beliebtesten Wookiee der Galaxis. Wenn man das Kostüm anhat, hat man praktisch bei allem Erfolg. Schon mal den Satz gehört: "Lass den Wookiee gewinnen"?[#Legal]

Diventa il potente Chewbecca, uno dei più celebri Wookiee della galassia. Riuscirai in qualsiasi cosa vorrai fare indossando questo costume. Hai mai sentito la frase, " Che vincano i Wookiee?"[#Legal]

Conviértete en el poderoso Chewbacca, uno de los más famosos wookiees de la galaxia. Tendrás un montón de éxito en casi todo lo que hagas cuando lleves este traje. ¿Has oído alguna vez la frase “deja ganar al wookiee”?[#Legal]
銀河一著名なウーキー、チューバッカになれる！ これを身に着ければ何をしてもうまくいくだろう。「ウーキーにおまかせ！」ってフレーズ、聞いたことない？[#Legal]
힘센 츄바카가 되어 보세요. 은하계에서 가장 유명한 우키 중 하나지요. 이 옷을 입으면 뭘 하든 대성공일걸요? "우키가 이기게 해"라는 말 들어보셨죠?[#Legal]

Become the mighty Chewbacca, one of the most celebrated Wookiees in the galaxy. You'll be extremely successful at just about everything you do when wearing this costume. Have you ever heard the phrase, "let the Wookiee win?"[#Legal]
成為全銀河系最聞名的武技人，高大強悍的秋巴卡。穿上這一套服裝，你會戰無不勝、攻無不克。有沒有聽過這句話：〝讓武技贏吧？〞[#Legal]
成為全銀河系最聞名的武技人，高大強悍的秋巴卡。穿上這一套服裝，你會戰無不勝、攻無不克。有沒有聽過這句話：〝讓武技贏吧？〞[#Legal]

Become the mighty Chewbacca, one of the most celebrated Wookiees in the galaxy. You'll be extremely successful at just about everything you do when wearing this costume. Have you ever heard the phrase, "let the Wookiee win?"[#Legal]
